mapper.update: UPDATE board_tb SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, category=#{category} where id =#{id}
mapper.select: select bt.id as id,title,content,writer, bct.name as categoryName,bt.category as categoryID, date, hit from board_tb AS bt left join board_category_tb as bct on bt.category = bct.id where del = 0 and bt.id = #{boardID}
mapper.update: UPDATE board_tb SET hit = hit + 1 where id =#{value}
mapper.select: select bct.id as id,bct.name as name, count(bt.content) as count from board_category_tb AS bct left join board_tb as bt on bct.id = bt.category group by name;

choose.when: select count(content) as count from board_tb
